properties.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 17 at 2:20AM CST by NWS Brownsville TX
properties.description:
Morning fog...some locally dense...has developed across portions
of The northern ranchlands, especially near Hebbronville. Local
visibility may be reduced to a quarter mile in some areas. The
fog will dissipate as daytime heating increases in the morning.

Motorists should drive with caution this morning as visibilities
may change rapidly over short distances. Use low beam headlights
and leave extra distance between your vehicle and others on the
road when encountering significant reductions in visibility. Allow
extra time to travel to destinations.

NWSheadline: AREAS OF FOG IMPACTING PORTIONS OF THE NORTHERN RANCHLANDS.
